DataElement.preferredName: Myocardial Infarction Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown indicator as to whether a patient has had a myocardial infarction

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Myocardial Infarction Patient Previous Year Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the patient having a personal medical history of myocardial infarction within the previous year.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area. (Dorland, 27th ed):Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Concepts.definition: Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis.
Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the have a history of myocardial infarction within the last 6 months?
